name: Guestbook iOS 14 Widget Template
description:
Guestbook iOS 14 Widget Template


How to use

  • Duplicate this template
  • Select medium or large frame widget
  • click Share > Copy Link then paste the link to https://design2shortcut.app
  • Enter any shortcut url
  • Click Create Widget
  • Install Glimpse 2.0 app on iPhone or iPad
  • Add new widget, copy and paste the generated link [https://design2shortcut.app/widget/{your_link}]
  • Add widget to homescreen
